buffInfo.active: <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/buccaneer/crossbones.png} tip={Crossbones (4th Job)} dur={[180s]}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/common/speed-infusion.png} tip={Speed Infusion (4th Job)} dur={[180s]}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/buccaneer/serpent-spirit.png} tip={Serpent Spirit (Hyper Skill)} dur={[90s]}>
buffInfo.buffCd: <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/common/roll-of-the-dice.png} tip={Roll of the Dice (3rd Job)} dur={[180s](180s cd / 90s cd if 1)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/buccaneer/stimulating-conversation.png} tip={Stimulating Conversation (Hyper Skill)} dur={[90s](180s cd)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/pirate/epic-adventure.png} tip={Epic Adventure (Hyper Skill)} dur={[60s](120s cd)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/buccaneer/lightning-form.png} tip={Lightning Form (5th Job)} dur={[80s](180s cd)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/5th-job/overdrive.png} tip={Overdrive (5th Job)} dur={[28s](60s cd)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/5th-job/maple-world-goddess-blessing.png} tip={Maple World Goddess's Blessing (5th Job)} dur={[60s](120s cd)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/5th-job/loaded-dice.png} tip={Loaded Dice (5th Job)} dur={(10s cd)}>

details: Can be stacked up to 3 times, once for each unique Explorer Pirate to reach Master Level
The stats are affected by %Stat bonuses

[Note]: Link Skill has a togglable effect where stats provided from your equipment can be swapped between STR + %STR and DEX + %DEX
  • Double-click the Link Skill to turn this effect ON/OFF
  • The effect only applies to the original Link Skill, not the transferred version
  • Excludes Primary and Secondary Weapon, Totems, and Symbols

info: To create one, choose the 'Explorers' option in the Character Creation screen and then continue through the story until you reach the town Lith Harbor where Sugar has a quest called 'The Adventure Begins'. Accept the quest and choose the option 'Pirate' when prompted

Continue with the story until Lv. 30 as a Pirate and talk to Kyrin to accept a quest called 'The 2 Types of Pirate'. Complete the quest by choosing the option Brawler and you will be on the path to a Buccaneer. Brawler is the 2nd job of Buccaneer

build: <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/pirate/pirate-leap.png} tip={Pirate Leap}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/pirate/bullet-time.png} tip={Bullet Time}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/pirate/dash.png} tip={Dash}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/pirate/shadow-heart.png} tip={Shadow Heart}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/pirate/sommersault-kick.png} tip={Sommersault Kick}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/pirate/double-shot.png} tip={Double Shot}>

<tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/common/physical-training.png} tip={Physical Training}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/buccaneer/perseverance.png} tip={Perseverance}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/buccaneer/hp-boost.png} tip={HP Boost}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/common/knuckle-mastery.png} tip={Knuckle Mastery}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/buccaneer/agile-knuckles.png} tip={Agile Knuckles}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/buccaneer/dark-clarity.png} tip={Dark Clarity}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/buccaneer/static-thumper.png} tip={Static Thumper}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/buccaneer/sea-serpent.png} tip={Sea Serpent}>

<tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/buccaneer/admirals-wings.png} tip={Admiral's Wings}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/buccaneer/precision-strikes.png} tip={Precision Strikes}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/buccaneer/groggy-mastery.png} tip={Groggy Mastery}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/buccaneer/greater-sea-serpent-i.png} tip={Greater Sea Serpent I}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/common/roll-of-the-dice.png} tip={Roll of the Dice}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/buccaneer/turning-kick.png} tip={Turning Kick}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/buccaneer/serpent-scale.png} tip={Serpent Scale}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/buccaneer/corkscrew-blow.png} tip={Corkscrew Blow}>

<tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/common/double-down.png} tip={Double Down}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/buccaneer/aggressive-stance.png} tip={Aggressive Stance}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/buccaneer/defensive-stance.png} tip={Defensive Stance}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/buccaneer/greater-sea-serpent-ii.png} tip={Greater Sea Serpent II}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/buccaneer/raging-serpent-assault.png} tip={Raging Serpent Assault}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/buccaneer/typhoon-crush.png} tip={Typhoon Crush}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/buccaneer/hook-bomber.png} tip={Hook Bomber}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/common/maple-warrior.png} tip={Maple Warrior}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/common/speed-infusion.png} tip={Speed Infusion}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/buccaneer/crossbones.png} tip={Crossbones}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/buccaneer/nautilus-strike.png} tip={Nautilus Strike}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/buccaneer/octopunch.png} tip={Octopunch}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/common/heros-will.png} tip={Hero's Will}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/buccaneer/time-leap.png} tip={Time Leap}>
details: All 1st to 4th Job skills can be maxed
Put one SP into each skill first and then max each skill in this order
For any skills that have prerequisites, follow them first before following build path

hyperBuild.recommended:
Bossing
  • Double Down - Saving Grace and Enhance
  • Octopunch - Reinforce, Boss Rush, and Extra Strike
Mobbing
  • Double Down - Saving Grace and Enhance
  • Hook Bomber - Reinforce, Spread, and Extra Strike

nodeInfo.recommended:
Primary Trio
Secondary Trio
  • Any combination of these skills are good but preferred from same category as you want to max primary first
  • 4 Boost Nodes total are needed to reach Master Level 60 for these skills (with Matrix Points used)
    • Nodes with the same Main Skill (skill at the top) cannot be equipped at the same time

content.specialThanks: Special thanks to Subluxe and the members of the Buccaneer Discord for their help in making this overview!
credits: Boost Nodes Build + Inner Ability + Hyper Passive Build

extraContent.title: Fighting, Sea Serpent, and Assault Skills
extraContent.content:
In 2nd Job, Fighting and Sea Serpent skills are introduced. When using a Fighting skill, Sea Serpent skills will automatically activate. Below is a list of all Fighting skills:

  • Static Thumper - 2nd Job
  • Turning Kick - 3rd Job
  • Hook Bomber - 4th Job
  • Octopunch - 4th Job
    • Can only trigger and

Sea Serpent skills can be toggled ON/OFF by using Sea Serpent. Sea Serpent skills are only activated by using Fighting skills and cannot be used on their own. Below is a list of all Sea Serpent skills:

  • Sea Serpent Burst - 2nd Job
  • Sea Serpent's Rage - 4th Job
    • Only activated by

In 3rd Job, Assault skills and Assault Mode are introduced. While in Assault Mode, using a Fighting skill will trigger an Assault skill and end Assault Mode

To enter Assault Mode, a special resource called 'Serpent Scales' is generated by triggering Sea Serpent skills. Upon gaining 5 Serpent Scales, use Serpent Scale to activate Assault Mode

While in Assault Mode, Sea Serpent skills will not trigger. Assault skills are only activated by Fighting skills and cannot be used on their own

Below is a list of all your Assault skills:

  • Serpent Assault - 3rd Job
  • Raging Serpent Assault - 4th Job
    • Only activated by

primary.name: Three Snails
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 7, Damage 40
primary.desc: Throws a snail shell forward that deals fixed amount of damage

primary.name: Recovery
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 15, Recover 72 HP over 30 sec

primary.name: Nimble Feet
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10, Duration 12, Movement Speed: 20

primary.name: Maple Return
primary.shortDesc: Returns you to Southperry Harbor on Maple Island.\nCooldown: 600 sec

primary.name: Master of Swimming
primary.shortDesc: Permanently increases swimming speed and prevents HP loss when swimming.

primary.name: Master of Organization
primary.shortDesc: Permanently expands Equip, Use, Set-up, and Etc. Inventory.

primary.name: Hero's Echo
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, increases Attack Power & Magic ATT by 4% for 2400 sec\nCooldown: 300 sec
details: To obtain this skill, complete the quest <link href={https://maplestorywiki.net/w/Quests/77/An_Arrangement_from_the_Goddess%2E} title={"An Arrangement from the Goddess"}>
Affects all nearby players

primary.name: Sommersault Kick
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 16, Damage: 155%, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Number of Attacks: 2
primary.desc: Kick forward damaging enemies
details: Only usable when equipped with Knuckles

primary.name: Double Shot
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 7, Bullet Cost: 2, fire 2 shots dealing 260% damage. At point of impact, Explosion Damage: 260%, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Max Range: 380
primary.desc: Fires two bullets that explode on impact damaging nearby enemies
details: Only usable when equipped with a Gun

primary.name: Pirate Leap
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10, allows you to jump a greater distance
primary.desc: Double jump skill
details: Can be assigned a Key Slot or activated by pressing jump twice

primary.name: Dash
primary.shortDesc: Dash, MP Cost: 1, Duration: Up to 10 sec., Movement Speed: +50, Jump: +20, Knockback Resistance: +100%
primary.desc: Double-tap the Left or Right Arrow Keys to start sprinting to increase Movement Speed and Jump
details: Right-clicking the skill will toggle a lock to prevent it from activating with the Arrow Keys
While sprinting, gain 100% Knockback Resistance

primary.name: Shadow Heart
primary.shortDesc: Critical Rate: +20%, Critical Damage: +5%

primary.name: Bullet Time
primary.shortDesc: Speed: +22, Jump: +10, Max Speed: +20

primary.name: Static Thumper
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 24, Damage: 370%, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Number of Attacks: 2
primary.desc: Releases a shockwave in front of you

primary.name: Advanced Dash
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 1, Travel a short distance. Speed: + 50, Jump: +20, Duration: Up to 10 sec.
primary.desc: Using <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/pirate/dash.png} tip={Dash (1st Job)}> now propels you forward
details: Additionally increases the effects of <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/pirate/dash.png} tip={Dash (1st Job)}>
Can be assigned a Key Slot to perform the dash and propel

primary.name: Dark Clarity
primary.shortDesc: Attack Power: +30

primary.name: Knuckle Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Knuckle Mastery: +50%

primary.name: HP Boost
primary.shortDesc: Max HP: +20%, Knockback Resistance: +100%

primary.name: Physical Training
primary.shortDesc: Permanently increase STR by 30 and DEX by 30.

primary.name: Perseverance
primary.shortDesc: Recover 5% HP/MP every 5 sec

primary.name: Vortex Jump
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 5. Allows you to jump a greater distance.
primary.desc: Up jump skill
details: Can be activated in the air while pressing the Up Arrow Key and Jump Key together

primary.name: Sea Serpent
primary.shortDesc: While active, your fighting skills trigger Sea Serpent skills. When a Sea Serpent skill triggers, 40 MP is consumed. Sea Serpent skills share a cooldown and cannot trigger while that cooldown is active.\nCooldown: 3 sec.
primary.desc: While toggled, using Fighting skills automatically activate Sea Serpent skills
details: Sea Serpent skills share cooldown with each other

primary.name: Sea Serpent Burst
primary.shortDesc: Damage: 111%, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Number of Attacks: 4\nCooldown: 11 sec.
primary.desc: A Sea Serpent appears forward damaging enemies in its path
details: Shares the same Skill Points (SP) with <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/buccaneer/sea-serpent.png} tip={Sea Serpent (2nd Job)}>
Unaffected by cooldown resets

primary.name: Agile Knuckles
primary.shortDesc: Attack Speed: +2, STR: +20

primary.name: Corkscrew Blow
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 34, Damage: 337%, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Number of Attacks: 2\nWhile using other skills, Cooldown: 4 sec.
primary.desc: Dashes forward while pushing back enemies
details: Can be linked with other attacks however the skill will go on cooldown<bp_Using the skill on its own will not put it on cooldown_>

When this skill is used first and is linked into <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/buccaneer/octopunch.png} tip={Octopunch (4th Job)}>, you will teleport forward to the nearest enemy, if any, and the skill will not go on cooldown

primary.name: Turning Kick
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 27, Damage: 433%, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Number of Attacks: 4, Stun Chance: 50%, Stun Duration: 7 sec
primary.desc: Releases a burst of energy around you
details: Attack has a chance to stun enemies

primary.name: Greater Sea Serpent I
primary.shortDesc: Damage: 173%, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Number of Attacks: 6\nCooldown: 9 sec.
details: Increases %Damage and Number of Attacks of attack
Reduces cooldown of attack

primary.name: Roll of the Dice
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 60, Buff Duration: 180, Cooldown: 180 sec
primary.desc: Grants a buff depending on the number rolled
details: [One]: Reduces cooldown of <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/common/roll-of-the-dice.png} tip={Roll of the Dice (3rd Job)}> by 50%
[Two]: Increases %DEF
[Three]: Increases %Max HP/MP
[Four]: Increases %Crit Rate
[Five]: Increases %Damage
[Six]: Increases %EXP Rate

primary.name: Serpent Scale
primary.shortDesc: Mp Cost: 50, consume 5 Serpent Scales and be able to use assault skills for 15 sec.\nGet 1 Serpent Scale on each Serpent Skill use. Max Serpent Scales: 5.
primary.desc: Consumes 5 Serpent Scales to enter Assault Mode
details: Serpent Scales are gained upon using a Sea Serpent Skill (up to 5 scales)
In Assault Mode, Fighting skills will trigger Assault skills instead of Sea Serpent skills<bp_Upon activating one Assault skill, Assault Mode will end_>
Right-clicking the skill will toggle Auto Use ON/OFF automatically activating Assault Mode upon collecting 5 Serpent Scales

primary.name: Serpent Assault
primary.shortDesc: Damage: 423%, Max Enemies Hit: 12, Number of Attacks: 6
primary.desc: A Sea Serpent erupts from the ground damaging enemies in a large area
details: Shares the same Skill Points (SP) with <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/buccaneer/serpent-scale.png} tip={Serpent Scale (3rd Job)}>
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Admiral's Wings
primary.shortDesc: Damage Taken: -20%

primary.name: Precision Strikes
primary.shortDesc: Attack Power: +30, Critical Rate: +15%, Critical Damage: +10%\nAdditional Critical Rate on Bosses: 20%

primary.name: Groggy Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Abnormal Status Resistance for stuns increases by an additional 35%. Stun Rate: 20%\nWhen attacking enemies affected by abnormal statuses, Critical Rate: +60%, Critical Damage: +15%
primary.desc: Reduces stun duration when affected by stuns and grants your attacks a chance to stun enemies
details: Additionally, attacks against enemies affected by debuffs gain increased %Crit Rate and %Crit Damage

primary.name: Octopunch
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 32, Damage: 320%, Number of Attacks: 10, Max Enemies Hit: 3
primary.desc: Unleashes a barrage of punches forward
details: Can only trigger <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/buccaneer/sea-serpents-rage.png} tip={Sea Serpent's Rage (4th Job)}> and <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/buccaneer/raging-serpent-assault.png} tip={Raging Serpent Assault (4th Job)}>

primary.name: Hook Bomber
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 46, Damage: 565%, Number of Attacks: 4, Max Enemies Hit: 7
primary.desc: Releases a punch creating a blast of energy forward

primary.name: Greater Sea Serpent II
primary.shortDesc: Enhances Sea Serpent Burst I to Sea Serpent Burst II. Unlocks Sea Serpent's Rage.
primary.desc: Enhances <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/buccaneer/sea-serpent-burst.png} tip={Sea Serpent Burst (2nd Job)}> further and unlocks <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/buccaneer/sea-serpents-rage.png} tip={Sea Serpent's Rage (4th Job)}>
details: Grants both skills Skill Points (SP)

primary.name: Sea Serpent Burst II
primary.shortDesc: Damage: 425%, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Number of Attacks: 8\nCooldown: 7 sec.
details: Increases %Damage and Number of Attacks of attack
Reduces cooldown of attack

primary.name: Sea Serpent's Rage
primary.shortDesc: Damage: 430%, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Number of Attacks: 6. Your attack skills deal +20% Final Damage against enemies afflicted with Serpent's Mark for 30 sec. Cooldown: 4 sec
primary.desc: A Sea Serpent appears and releases a bite forward that debuffs enemies hit
details: [Debuff - Serpent's Mark]: Enemy takes increased %Final Damage
Shares the same Skill Points (SP) with <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/buccaneer/greater-sea-serpent-ii.png} tip={Greater Sea Serpent II (4th Job)}>
Triggers only when using <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/buccaneer/octopunch.png} tip={Octopunch (4th Job)}>
Unaffected by cooldown resets

primary.name: Raging Serpent Assault
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 50, continuously attacks enemies for up to 5 sec, dealing 420% damage 4 times to up to 6 enemies. Disappears after 15 attacks.\n[Passive Effects] Serpent Assault Damage: +100%
primary.desc: A Sea Serpent continuously attacks an area for a few seconds
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases the %Damage of <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/buccaneer/serpent-assault.png} tip={Serpent Assault (3rd Job)}>
Triggers only when using <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/buccaneer/octopunch.png} tip={Octopunch (4th Job)}>

primary.name: Nautilus Strike
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 350, Damage: 440%, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Number of Attacks: 7\n[Final Attack Skills] 100% chance to strike 2 additional times for 165% damage. Duration: 165% when attacking with Somersault Kick, Corkscrew Blow, Octopunch, Serpent Vortex, Howling Fist, or Release Neptunus. Does not trigger with Neptunus Enrage.\nCooldown: 60 sec.
primary.desc: Launches a massive attack that damages a large area
details: [Final Attack]: Permanently when using <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/pirate/sommersault-kick.png} tip={Sommersault Kick (1st Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/buccaneer/corkscrew-blow.png} tip={Corkscrew Bolt (3rd Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/buccaneer/octopunch.png} tip={Octopunch (4th Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/buccaneer/serpent-vortex.png} tip={Serpent Vortex (5th Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/buccaneer/howling-fist.png} tip={Howling Fist (5th Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/buccaneer/unleash-neptunus.png} tip={Unleash Neptunus (6th Job)}> (does not trigger Neptunus Enrage) will deal an additional attack
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Crossbones
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 45, Duration: 180 sec, Attack Power: +15%.\n[Passive Effect: Increases Knuckle Mastery by 70%, Final Damage: +13%, Abnormal Status Resistance by 30, and Elemental Resistance by 30%]
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases %Weapon Mastery, %Final Damage, Abnormal Status Resistance, and %Elemental Resistance

primary.name: Time Leap
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 405, Cooldown: 180 sec\nParty members that received the effect cannot receive Time Leap's effect again for 180 sec.
primary.desc: Resets the cooldown of all skills below 5th Job (including Beginner skills) unless stated otherwise
details: Excludes Hyper Skills and skills provided from items like Firestarter Ring, Breath of Divinity, or Lucid Earrings
Party members who received Time Leap's effects previously have a cooldown (180 secs) before the effects can be applied again
Unaffected by cooldown resets

primary.name: Speed Infusion
primary.shortDesc: HP Cost: 40, MP Cost: 40, Attack Speed Increase Duration: 180 sec
primary.desc: Increases Attack Speed (by 2 stages)

primary.name: Maple Warrior
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70, Goddess of Maple World appears\n[Passive Effect: All stats with a direct AP investment increase by 15%]
details: Skill is a passive, the active effect does nothing except displays an animation

primary.name: Hero's Will
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Cooldown: 300 sec
primary.desc: Removes certain abnormal status effects and become immune to Abnormal Status for 3 secs
details: Unaffected by <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/paladin/combat-orders.png} tip={Temporarily increases all of your skill levels. Only 4th Job Skills can be increased beyond master level while other skills can only be increased to master level. Exceptions: Some special skills, beginner skills, Combat Orders, hyper skills, 5th job skills, and 6th job skills cannot be increased.}/> Combat Orders

primary.name: Double Down
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 60, 50% chance of rolling a Double Down, Buff Duration: 180 sec\nCooldown: 180 sec
details: Grants a chance to roll two dices at once

primary.name: Defensive Stance
primary.shortDesc: When sea serpent or assault skills hit, generates a protective shield for 3 sec that takes 25% damage (includes damage proportional to Max HP).\nUnable to recreate Protective Shield for 4 sec when activated.
primary.desc: Upon landing a successful Sea Serpent or Assault skill, create a barrier that reduces damage taken (including %Max HP attacks)

primary.name: Aggressive Stance
primary.shortDesc: When one of your attack skills hits an enemy, grants a buff that increases your damage by 25% for 10 sec. Striking a foe while the buff is active will refresh its duration.\n[Passive Effects] Corkscrew Blow Damage: +100%
primary.desc: Successfully landing attacks grant a %Damage buff
details: Also permanently increases %Damage of <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/buccaneer/corkscrew-blow.png} tip={Corkscrew Blow (3rd Job)}>

primary.name: Typhoon Crush
primary.shortDesc: Ignore Defense: 40%, Final Damage: +10%, Attack Power: +30

hyperPassive.name: Double Down - Saving Grace
hyperPassive.shortDesc: When Double Down does not activate, there is a 40% chance for the cooldown to not apply. The next cast after this will activate Double Down with 4 or above.

hyperPassive.name: Double Down - Addition
hyperPassive.shortDesc: Lucky number 7 added to Double Down
details: When rolled, increases %Ignore DEF

hyperPassive.name: Double Down - Enhance
hyperPassive.shortDesc: Increases the chances of rolling a 4, 5, or 6 in Roll of the Dice.

hyperActive.name: Stimulating Conversation
hyperActive.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 300 Duration: 90 sec, Damage: +20%
While active, Sea Serpent Burst, Sea Serpent's Rage, and Lord of the Deep Cooldown: -50%
Cooldown: 180 sec
[Passive Effect: Boss Damage: +20%]
hyperActive.desc: While active, increases %Damage and reduces the cooldown of the following skills by half: <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/buccaneer/sea-serpent-burst.png} tip={Sea Serpent Burst (2nd Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/buccaneer/sea-serpents-rage.png} tip={Sea Serpent's Rage (4th Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/buccaneer/lord-of-the-deep.png} tip={Lord of the Deep (5th Job)}>
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases %Boss Damage

hyperActive.name: Serpent Spirit
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 50, Duration: 90 sec, Sea Serpent Will: Every time an enemy with the Serpent Mark is attacked, Max Sea Serpent Will Stacks: 3\nCritical Damage: +5% per Serpent Will\nSea Serpent Will Duration: 30 sec. Stacks can be refreshed during the effect.
hyperActive.desc: While active, attacking enemies debuffed by <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/buccaneer/sea-serpents-rage.png} tip={Sea Serpent's Rage (4th Job)}> grants a stacking %Crit Damage buff

hyperActive.name: Epic Adventure
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, Duration: 60 sec, Damage: +10%\nApplies to any Explorer class in the party\nCooldown: 120 sec.

fifthMain.name: Lightning Form
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1000
Duration: 80 sec, Final Damage: +26%.
Can use up to 3 energy orbs
Energy orb will periodically deal 1150% damage 10 times on up to 10 enemies, 1 orb can attack a single enemy up to 14 times
Critical Rate: +50%, Ignore Defense: +50%
Cooldown: 180 sec.
fifthMain.desc: Transforms into a special form where you gain increased %Final Damage
details: While transformed, press the Skill Key to release an energy orb (up to 3 orbs)<bp_Energy orb has increased %Crit Rate and %Ignore DEF_Energy orb is unaffected by Damage Reflect_Each orb can only attack a single enemy up to 14 times_While casting, you are invincible_>
While transformed, tapping an Arrow Key twice will teleport you in that direction

fifthMain.name: Lord of the Deep
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 300, When activated, can attack 100 times. When attacking boss monster, counts 1 time while attacking 3 times.
Automatically attacks up to 10 enemies dealing 780% damage 3 time(s).
Reduces cooldown by 10 sec. for every 40 normal enemies defeated. When skill ends, reduces cooldown by 6 sec. for every 10 remaining number of attacks.
Cooldown: 3 sec
fifthMain.desc: Creates a rotating Sea Serpent around you that damages enemies it touches
details: The attack can only hit 100 times before disappearing<bp_Attacking a boss 3 times counts as 1 attack towards this_>
The cooldown is reduced for every 40 enemies you defeat
The cooldown is reduced for every 10 attacks that remain when the skill ends
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Serpent Vortex
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 350, Uses 1 Ocean Force
Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 1320%, Number of Attacks: 10, damage increased by 30% when attacking a boss
1 Ocean Force is recharged every 8 sec, and you can hold up to 6 at a time.
Cooldown: 0.5 sec
fifthMain.desc: Dashes towards a chosen direction while damaging enemies in your path
details: Uses a special resource called 'Ocean Force' which is gained every 8 secs (up to 6 charges)
Deals increased %Damage to bosses
Right-clicking the skill will toggle a function ON/OFF to consume all available 'Ocean Force' when skill is used to trigger all attacks in one attack

fifthMain.name: Howling Fist
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1200
By collecting power, periodically attack up to 8 enemies, for 935% damage, 6 time(s)
The strike will activate a series of additional shocks, attacking 15 enemies, for 1505% damage, 14 time(s) per shock. 14 shock(s) will occur in total.
Cooldown: 90 sec
fifthMain.desc: Slowly charges for a devastating punch attack
details: While casting, pressing the Skill Key again will release the punch early
You are invincible once the punch attack executes

masteryCore.name: 1st Mastery Node
details: Requires <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/buccaneer/octopunch.png} tip={Octopunch (4th Job)}> enhanced with V Matrix at least Lv. 40 (before Matrix Points) to unlock

masteryCore.name: HEXA Octopunch
masteryCore.shortDesc: MP Cost: 52, Max Enemies Hit: 4, Damage: 455%, Number of Attacks: 10.\nWhen Raging Serpent Assault activates, Super Octopunch Duration: 10 sec\nSuper Octopunch - MP Cost: 52, Max Enemies Hit: 4, Damage: 270%, Number of Attacks: 3. Afterwards, Max Enemies Hit: 4, Shock Wave Damage: 455%, Number of Attacks: 10
details: Unlocked with 1st Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: 2nd Mastery Node
details: Requires <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/buccaneer/sea-serpent-burst.png} tip={Sea Serpent Burst/Serpent Assault (2nd / 3rd Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/buccaneer/sea-serpents-rage.png} tip={Sea Serpent's Rage/Raging Serpent Assault (4th Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/buccaneer/nautilus-strike.png} tip={Nautilus Strike (4th Job)}> enhanced with V Matrix at least Lv. 40 (before Matrix Points) to unlock

masteryCore.name: HEXA Sea Serpent
masteryCore.shortDesc:
MP Cost per Serpent Skill: 44
HEXA Sea Serpent Burst
Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 860%, Number of Attacks: 8
Cooldown: 6 sec
HEXA Sea Serpent's Rage
MP Cost: 44, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 870%, Number of Attacks: 6
Your attack skills deal +20% Final Damage against enemies afflicted with Serpent's Mark for 30 sec
Cooldown: 4 sec
details: Unlocked with 2nd Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: HEXA Nautilus Strike
masteryCore.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 385, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 888%, Number of Attacks: 7
[Final Attack Skills] 100% chance to strike 2 additional times for 501% damage when attacking with Somersault Kick, Corkscrew Blow, Octopunch, Serpent Vortex, Howling Fist, or Unleash Neptunus.
Does not trigger with Neptunus Enrage.
Cooldown: 60 sec
details: Unlocked with 2nd Mastery Node

originSkill.name: Unleash Neptunus
originSkill.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1200, invincible during casting
Neptunus, the original sea serpent, awakens, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 1380%, Number of Attacks: 13, Waves: 4. Afterwards, Damage: 1140%, Number of Attacks: 15, Ocean Fury: 22
When using 5th job skills (excluding Lord of the Deep and fighting skills), Neptunus Enrage activates for 30 sec.
Neptunus Enrage - Cooldown: 4 sec
1st hit - Max Enemies Hit: 10, Damage: 1680%, Number of Attacks: 12
2nd hit - Max Enemies Hit: 10, Damage: 1800%, Number of Attacks: 13
3rd hit - Max Enemies Hit: 10, Damage: 1920%, Number of Attacks: 15
4th hit - Max Enemies Hit: 10, Damage: 1920%, Number of Attacks: 15
5th hit - Max Enemies Hit: 10, Damage: 2180%, Number of Attacks: 15
Cooldown: 360 sec

meta: Buccaneer is a STR pirate class part of the Explorers. Buccaneer utilize Knuckles as their primary weapons. For their secondary weapon, Buccaneer can equip Wrist Bands
